examples.text: Stan on niveltulehduksen uhri, Chris Stanin loputtoman valituksen uhri.
examples.english: Stan is a martyr to arthritis, Chris a martyr to Stan's endless moaning about it.

glosses: martyr (one who suffers greatly and/or constantly)
to bluster (to talk pompously or violently)
sacrificial lamb (lamb killed as an offering to the gods)
threat, menace (person or object that is regarded as a danger)
threat, risk (indication of potential or imminent danger)

words.etymology_text: From Proto-Finnic *uhka. Cognates include Estonian uhal (adverb), Ingrian uhka and Karelian uhka.
uh- + -o, from the same root as uhka and uhma.
